choose.when: select a.no, a.title, a.contents, b.name, a.hit, a.reg_date, a.g_no, a.o_no, depth, a.user_no " from board a, user b where a.user_no = b.no order by a.g_no desc, a.o_no asc limit #{startOffset }, #{size }
choose.otherwise: select * from board where title like '%${keyword }%' or contents like '%${keyword }%' limit #{startOffset }, #{size }
select count(*) from board where title like '%${_parameter }%' or contents like '%${_parameter }%'
